evidence: Presence of a single src directory with a clear module structure (telepathy, config, utils, const)
Use of __init__.py files indicating Python packages, supporting modular organization
Separation of concerns with distinct files for configuration (config.ini), constants (const.py), utilities (utils.py), and main logic (telepathy.py)
Absence of multiple services or packages indicating microservices or distributed architecture
Presence of tests in a separate directory but within the same repository, typical of a monolithic structure
Low package count (0) and moderate avg_fan_out (2.2) suggest internal modularity without distributed complexity
risks: Low maintainability index (mi_avg: 59.47) may indicate tight coupling or code quality issues within modules
Maximum directory depth of 4 may hint at some nested complexity, which if not managed, could degrade modularity over time
